full_text: Soly Melamed, M.D. General Practice 136 N. Bedford Drive, . Suite 303 Fax: (818) 243-3368 1030 S. Glendale Ave. Suite 302 Beverly Hills, CA 90210 Glendale, CA 91205 (310) 859-0853 (818) 241-4162 CURRICULUM VITAE EDUCATIONAL DATA: 1953-1960 All medical education in Paris (France) Medical graduation thesis presided by Emeritus Professor Marcel Lelong. 1960-1964 Four years residency in various medical departments with Professor Lelong. 1964-1966 Fellowship at Purpan Hospital (France) 1966-1979 Professor on faculty at University of Tehran. Also private practice as General practice and Psychologist. 1979-1980 Medical State Board of California. 1980-1981 Internship at Wadsworth VA and UCLA Medical Centers. 1981 Medical license of California. 1984 ACLS (Advanced Cardiac Life Support) . Adult and Children. MEDICAL PRACTICE: General practice & adult and adolescent psychology. Professor of faculty. 42 years experience in medicine. Selected physician for Interstate Teleconference regarding different medical problems.
